label: Replacement parts must be OEM parts if a shipped OEM part fails.
quote: In the event that a shipped OEM part fails, all replacement parts must be OEM parts.

label: Use of non-new OEM components only with formal Government approval.
quote: The Contractor shall be excused from using new OEM (i.e. 'grey market,' previously used) components only with formal Government approval.

label: Non-new OEM components must be procured from original genuine source and shipped only from authorized shipment points.
quote: Such components shall be procured from their original genuine source and have the components shipped only from manufacturers authorized shipment points.

label: Provide all OEM software updates to correct defects for the life of the product.
quote: For software products, the contractor shall provide all OEM software updates to correct defects for the life of the product (i.e. until the 'end of life.').

label: Software updates and patches must be made available to the government for all products procured under this contract.
quote: Software updates and patches must be made available to the government for all products procured under this contract.

label: Employ formal and accountable transit, storage, and delivery procedures for all shipments.
quote: Contractors shall employ formal and accountable transit, storage, and delivery procedures (i.e., the possession of the component is documented at all times from initial shipping point to final destination, and every transfer of the component from one custodian to another is fully documented and accountable) for all shipments to fulfill contract obligations with the Government.

label: Maintain all records pertaining to transit, storage, and delivery and make available for inspection for the lessor of the term of the contract, period of performance, or one calendar year from the date the activity occurred.
quote: All records pertaining to the transit, storage, and delivery will be maintained and available for inspection for the lessor of the term of the contract, the period of performance, or one calendar year from the date the activity occurred.

label: Records must be readily available for inspection by any agent designated by the US Government.
quote: These records must be readily available for inspection by any agent designated by the US Government as having the authority to examine them.

label: Minimize number of custody changes and use tamper-proof or tamper-evident packaging for all shipments.
quote: This transit process shall minimize the number of times en route components undergo a change of custody and make use tamper-proof or tamper-evident packaging for all shipments.

label: Supplier shall be able to provide shipping status at any time during transit upon Government request.
quote: The supplier, at the Governmentâ€™s request, shall be able to provide shipping status at any time during transit.

label: Contractor is fully liable for all damage, deterioration, or losses incurred during shipment and handling unless due to the Government.
quote: The Contractor is fully liable for all damage, deterioration, or losses incurred during shipment and handling, unless the damage, deterioration, or loss is due to the Government.

label: Provide a packing slip with each container or package including contract number, order number, description, and customer point of contact.
quote: The Contractor shall provide a packing slip which shall accompany each container or package with the information identifying the contract number, the order number, a description of the hardware/software enclosed (Manufacturer name, model number, serial number), and the customer point of contact.

label: Send shipping notification electronically to intended government recipient or contracting officer including contract number, order number, description, initial shipper, shipping date, and tracking number.
quote: The contractor shall send a shipping notification to the intended government recipient or contracting officer. This shipping notification shall be sent electronically and will state the contract number, the order number, a description of the hardware/software being shipped (manufacturer name, model number, serial number), initial shipper, shipping date and identifying (tracking) number.
